name: Farkeep - ⚔️ A Modern Zelda-like
description:
This early tech-demo gives you a look into the gameplay and controls. Some features are missing, some sounds are missing, there will be bugs present and it's overall a little rough right now. However, we'd love to hear your feedback and know if it runs well on your system!

Follow the development
Join our Discord
Follow us on Twitter
Join our upcoming Kickstarter campaign

Be well,
Beartwigs
